name: Tower of Lune
description:
Tower of Lune is a fast-paced top-down action shooter game that is set as a spin-off sequel  of our next planned production called 'Clair de Lune' RPG game.

Once upon a time, there was a dark ominous tower in the middle of the woods somewhere in our world, seemingly abandoned for hundreds of years. It is said that in the folklore, there lived a Dark Lord, trapped whilst waiting for a Judgment day to come to be free and consume the world once he obtained a pure intelligent soul free of any corruptions to be sacrificed to the moon of Lune above his dark tower. That day would finally come for the Dark Lord saw 2 intelligent slimes in his tower fell in love with each other. The dark lord moves to set his plan in motion to forcibly take one of the intelligent slime to be sacrificed to the Lune while trapping the other one in his lower parts of the tower.

Fight your way into the countless floors of the dark ominous tower controlled by the mysterious Dark Lord that had kidnapped your lover to be sacrificed to the Lune as an attempt for him to start conquering the whole world.  Every floor tower act as a 'dungeon',  and there will be sets of enemies in each room aswell as floor/ dungeon bosses to take care of in-order to progress through the end of the floor/ dungeon. Each floor/ dungeon may contain a special coins that could help you upgrade your character to be much more powerful than before!

Control:
WASD : Movement
Left Click + Hold :  Attack

PS : Due to the nature of the "Prototype Version", some features might not available in the early launch such as 'Upgrade' and 'Setting'.
